about.description: A JavaScript/React.js Developer passionate about web development. I have been self-teaching for the past three years and recently earned a certificate in JavaScript/React.js to further enhance my skills. I am excited to contribute to projects. Let's Connect !.

projects.title: Side Projects
projects.credentials: To try the applications, you can use the following credentials:
projects.note: Sometimes, you need to wait a few seconds to log in, it depends on the network.

socialMedia.title: Social-Media
socialMedia.description: I developed a RESTful API for managing posts, incorporating features such as image uploads, comment editing, and deletion. I proficiently navigated the React ecosystem, employing techniques like the spread operator, conditional rendering, and state management with Redux Toolkit.

notesChatApp.title: Notes-Chat-app (in progress)
notesChatApp.description: The Notes application allows users to create notes with advanced features such as saving notes in a MySQL database, editing and deleting notes, as well as assigning each note to a category.

eCommerceApp.title: E-Commerce-app
eCommerceApp.description: I designed this e-commerce website to enhance my skills in React JS Hooks, particularly useContext and useReducer, which facilitated efficient management of the shopping cart.

dashboardApp.title: Dashboard-app
dashboardApp.description: I developed this dashboard using Express JS, MongoDB, and React JS to better master database management and display data using the Context API.
